entities.name: cupboard
entities.description: The cupboard is mentioned as a place where the locket was found. ("There was a locket there.")

entities.name: locket
entities.description: The locket is mentioned as an object that was found in the cupboard. ("There was a locket there.")

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who can sense Ron and Hermione's tensions and excitement. ("He could sense Ron and Hermione’s tensions and excitement too.")

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone whose tension and excitement Harry can sense. ("He could sense Ron and Hermione’s tensions and excitement too.")

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone whose tension and excitement Harry can sense. ("He could sense Ron and Hermione’s tensions and excitement too.")

entities.name: Mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is mentioned as someone who asks questions about the locket. ("Why? asked Mundungus, “Is it valuable?”")

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about the locket. ("Harry’s mouth was suddenly dry.")
Hermione accuses Mundungus of still having the locket. ("You’ve still got it!" cried Hermione.)
Ron also accuses Mundungus of still having the locket. ("No, he hasn’t," said Ron shrewdly.)
Mundungus claims to have given the locket away. ("Bleedin’ gave it away, di’n’ I? No choice.")
